name: Slayer
description:
turns the odds in your favor by earning stacks of Feeling Lucky when scoring Critical Strikes with any non-basic power. Stacks of Feeling Lucky are spent when performing certain powers to modify them as described below:

Inconceivable:
Luck increases coin flips by 1 per 2 stacks
Luck increases duration by 1 second per stack

Redirect Pain:
Luck increases barrier by 100 per stack
Luck increases Retribution by 1% per stack
Luck increases duration by 1 second per stack

Dodge:
Recover a Dodge pip with 10 stacks
